channel.title: The ability for King to find neuts has GOT TO GO
channel.description: I posted this on Reddit, thought I should post it here too. King has GOT to lose the ability to find neutrals, NK is already hard enough to play as it is, I don't need the 25% chance that I auto-lose just because King found out I'm a fucking neut. King checks must be binary like Sheriff's and Paladin's, SUS/NS

item.title: The ability for King to find neuts has GOT TO GO
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
King has guard, and voting power, but not vote control.

The power of the King should be that he can get people executed.

item.title: The ability for King to find neuts has GOT TO GO
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:

There must be another way to make the King important.
